data.news_body: We hereby inform you that the Board of Directors of Knowledge Marine & Engineering Works Limited at its meeting held on Today i.e. Thursday February 12 2026 has considered and approved (a) Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for Quarter and Nine Months ended December 31 2025. data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Dated January 30 2026
data.news_body: We wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Knowledge Marine & Engineering Works Limited at their meeting held on today i.e. Friday January 30 2026 has considered and approved the scheme of Amalgamation of two wholly owned Subsidiary companies of the Company viz. (a) Indian Ports Dredging Private Limited and (b) Knowledge Infra Ports Private Limited with Knowledge Marine & Engineering Works Limited under Section 230 to 232 of the Companies Act 2013 read with relevant rules and regulations made thereunder.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Allotment Of Equity Shares Of Rs. 10/- Each And Warrants Convertible Into Equity Shares Of Rs. 10/- Each Of The Knowledge Marine & Engineering Works Limited On A Preferential Basis
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we wish to inform that pursuant to the approval of Members of the Company at its Extraordinary General Meeting held on Thursday October 09 2025 and in-principle approval received from BSE Limited and National Stock Exchange of India Limited dated October 17 2025 the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. Thursday October 30 2025 has inter alia considered and approved the allotment 1421054  Equity Shares of Rs. 10/- each and 77946 Convertible into Equity shares of Rs. 10/- each of the Company

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Updates on Acquisition
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Schedule III of the SEBI (Listing Obligation and Disclosure Requirement) Regulation 215 and in continuance with our Letter dated May 30 2025 we hereby inform you that the Knowledge Marine & Engineering Works Limited ("Company") has completed the acquisition of 29.99% shares of Indian Ports Dredging Private Limited 25.99% shares of Knowledge Infra Ports Private Limited and 51.00% shares of Kamal Marine & Engineering Works Private Limited.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Credit Rating
data.news_body: We are glad to inform you that the CARE Ratings Limited has assigned the credit ratings on Credit facilities availed by the Knowledge Marine & Engineering Works Limited from Bank/Institution. The CARE Ratings assigned one notch upgraded ratings as compared to previous ratings to "BBB+;Stable" for Long Term Bank Facilities and "A2" for Short Term Bank Facilities. Kindly take the same on your records.

data.news_body: We wish to inform you that the Management of the Company will be interacting with Institutional Investor viz. Tiger Assets on Sunday July 20 2025 at 11.00 AM virtually. The discussion with the Investor(s)/ Analysts are based on generally available information and not related to any Unpublished Price Sensitive Information.

data.caption: Clarification With Respect To Significant Increase In The Volume Of Security
data.news_body: In response to clarification sought by BSE Limited vide their e-mail dated July 11 2025 with respect to significant increase in the volume of the Security we submit that the movement in scrip price/ volume is not attributable to any event/ information emanating from within the Company. The Increase in the Volume is market driven and the Company does not have any information which can relate to Increase in trading volume of the Companys shares.

data.caption: Clarification sought from Knowledge Marine & Engineering Works Ltd

The Exchange has sought clarification from Knowledge Marine & Engineering Works Ltd on July 11 2025 with reference to Movement in Volume.

The reply is awaited.

data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of Knowledge Marine & Engineering Work Limited at its Board Meeting held on Today May 30 2025 has considered and approved the following:
1. Approval of Audited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results of the Company  for the quarter and year ended March 31 2025

data.descriptor: Format of the Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate : Annexure
data.caption: Format of the Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate : Annexure A
data.news_body:
Format of Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate.

Sr. No. Particulars Details
1Name of CompanyKnowledge Marine & Engineering Works Ltd
2CIN NO.L74120MH2015PLC269596
3 Outstanding borrowing of company as on 31st March / 31st December as applicable (in Rs cr) 132.86
4Highest Credit Rating during the previous FY NA
4aName of the Credit Rating Agency issuing the Credit Rating mentioned in (4)CRISIL LTD.
5Name of Stock Exchange# in which the fine shall be paid in case of shortfall in the required borrowing under the frameworkBSE


We confirm that we are a Large Corporate as per the applicability criteria given under the SEBI circular SEBI/HO/DDHS/CIR/P/2018/144 dated November 26 2018. No



Name of the Company Secretary: Avdhoot Kotwal
Designation: Company Secretary and Compliance Officer
EmailId: Compliance@kmew.in
Name of the Chief Financial Officer: Kanak Kewalramani
Designation: Whole time Director and Chief Financial Officer
EmailId: kanak@kmew.in

Date: 29/04/2025

Note: In terms para of 3.2(ii) of the circular beginning F.Y 2022 in the event of shortfall in the mandatory borrowing through debt securities a fine of 0.2% of the shortfall shall be levied by Stock Exchanges at the end of the two-year block period. Therefore an entity identified as LC shall provide in its initial disclosure for a financial year the name of Stock Exchange to which it would pay the fine in case of shortfall in the mandatory borrowing through debt markets.

data.descriptor: Award of Order / Receipt of Order
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Award_of_Order_Receipt_of_Order
data.news_body: Knowledge Marine & Engineering Works Limited (KMEW) has received a work order from Dredging Corporation of India Limited (DCIL) for Chartering of the Trailing Suction Hopper Dredger for carrying out the Dredging in the navigational channel Kandla Creek Oil Jetties & Cargo Berths at Deendayal Port. The Contract is for the period of 1 year and can be extended by one more year at the mutual agreement of  KMEW & DCIL. The contract is valued at Rs. 484555509/- inclusive of taxes.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: We wish to inform you that the standalone & consolidated unaudited financial statement of the Company for the quarter ended December 31 2024 will be considered and approved in accordance with Reg 33 of SEBI (LODR) Regulation 2015 on or before February 14 2025. In this regard the trading window for dealing in the securities of the Company will be closed from closure of business hours on Friday December 27 2024 and same remain closed till 48 hours after declaration of financial results for the quarter ended December 31 2024.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On Tuesday, 30Th May, 2023 And Submission Of Audited Financial Statements For The Half-Year And Year Ended On 31St March, 2023
data.news_body:
Pursuant to provisions of Regulation 33 and other applicable provisions of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements), Regulations 2015 ('SEBI LODR'), we would like to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company, at their meeting held on Tuesday, 30th May, 2023 have inter alia, considered, approved and taken on records the Audited Consolidated and Standalone Financial Statements/Results of the Company for the Half Year and Financial Year ended on 31st March, 2023 along with Statutory Audit Report for Standalone as well as Consolidated Financials of the Company issued by the Statutory Auditor of the Company, M/s. RV Luharuka & Co. LLP and other requisite statements.
Thanking you

data.caption: Submission Of Standalone And Consolidated Audited Financial Statements For The Half-Year And Year Ended On 31St March, 2022
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the Company have, at their meeting held on Friday, 06th May, 2022 (i.e. today) inter alia, considered the following core agendas:
1. The Board of Directors of the Company, has considered and approved the Consolidated and Standalone Audited Financial Statements/Results of the Company for the Half Year and Financial Year ended on 31st March, 2022 duly reviewed and recommended by the Audit Committee of the Company, along with all the related documents

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On Friday, 06Th May, 2022 And Submission Of Audited Financial Statements For The Half-Year And Year Ended On 31St March, 2022
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the Company have, at their meeting held on Friday, 06th May, 2022 (i.e. today) inter alia, considered the following core agendas:
1. The Board of Directors of the Company, has considered and approved the Consolidated and Standalone Audited Financial Statements/Results of the Company for the Half Year and Financial Year ended on 31st March, 2022 duly reviewed and recommended by the Audit Committee of the Company, along with other related documents
2. The Board has reviewed and approved the Secretarial Audit Report by M/s. Deepak Kewaliya & Co. for the F.Y. 2021-22.
3. The Board has appointed M/s Deepak Kewaliya & Co. as the Secretarial Auditor of the Company for the F.Y. 2022-23.
4. The Board has appointed M/s. RSSA & Associates as an Internal Auditor of the Company for the F.Y. 2022-23.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On Saturday, 13Th November, 2021 And Submission Of Half Yearly Unaudited Financial Statements As On 30/09/2021
data.news_body:
Incompliance with Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirement) Regulations, 2015 this is to inform you that the Board of Director of the Company at its meeting held on Saturday, 13th November 2021 has considered and approved the following matters:
1. Unaudited Financial Result along with the Statement of Assets & Liabilities and Statement of Cash Flow of the Company for the half year ended on 30th September, 2021.
2. Limited Review Reports of the Statutory Auditors of the Company on the Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the half year ended on 30th September, 2021.
The aforesaid unaudited financial results are also available on the Company's Website at www.kmew.in.
Please note that the meeting of Board of Directors was commenced at 4.00 PM and concluded at 04:45 PM.
You are requested to kindly take the above information in your records.

data.caption: Resubmission Of Statement Of Asset & Liabilities For Year Ended March 31, 2021
data.news_body:
Pursuant to emails received from BSE Limited dated 17th July, 2021 regarding 'Bifurcation of Trade payable not Provided as per Accounting standard Division I Format'. This error in disclosure has been in advertently and was unintentional with no impact on financials stated earlier.

We hereby enclosing herewith the Revised Statement of Assets & Liabilities for the year ended March 31, 2021 bifurcating trade payables as per accounting standard division I format.

We kindly request you to consider the same and take it in your records.

data.caption: Revised Outcome Of The Board Meeting Along With Audited Financial Statements/Results For The Half Year As Well As Financial Year Ended On 31St March, 2021
data.news_body:
Dear Sir/Madam,
With reference to the above subject, we submit as follows:
1. The revised values of Basic and Diluted Earning Per Share (EPS) in the Statement of Financial Results for the half year and year ended March 31, 2021.
2. An Additional Note (Note No. 5) for EPS Calculation has been inserted in the Notes to the Standalone and Consolidated Financial Statements.
Kindly find attached herewith revised Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Statement for the half year and year ended March 31, 2021 and ignore the previous one as submitted on 28th June, 2021 due to some inadvertent error.
We regret the inconvenience caused and request you to kindly take the revised results in your records and oblige.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting Along With Audited Financial Statements/Results For The Half As Well As Year Ended On 31St March, 2021.
data.news_body:
Dear Sir/Madam,
We would like to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company have, at their meeting held on Monday, 28th June 2021 (i.e. today) inter alia, considered the following core agendas:
The Board of Directors of the Company, has considered and approved the Audited Financial Statements/Results (Standalone as well as Consolidated) of the Company for the Half Year and Financial Year ended on 31st March, 2021 duly reviewed and recommended by the Audit Committee of the Company.
